stimulusHtml: Which of the following changes can be made so that the code segment works as intended?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

for (int j = 1; j <= 4; j++)         // Line 1
{
   for (int k = j + 1; k >= 1; k--)  // Line 3
   {
      System.out.print(j + " ");     // Line 5
   } 
   System.out.println();
}

 

The code segment is intended to produce the following output, but does not work as intended.

 

1 
2 2 
3 3 3 
4 4 4 4

choicesHtml: Changing line 1 to for (int j = 1; j < 4; j++)
Changing line 3 to for (int k = 1; k <= j + 1; k++)
Changing line 3 to for (int k = j; k >= 1; k--)
